content.rendered:
I have been working as an editor on national and international filmprojects since 2004. I studied film at the School of Arts Utrecht, English (University of Groningen) and Psychology (University of Groningen).

I am an active member of the Netherlands association of Cinema Editors (NCE)
and the Dutch Academy for Film (DAFF).

Don’t be shy to contact me. I’m always open to making something beautiful together.

acf.text:
I have been working as an editor on national and international filmprojects since 2004. I studied film at the School of Arts Utrecht, English (University of Groningen) and Psychology (University of Groningen).

I am an active member of the Netherlands association of Cinema Editors (NCE)
and the Dutch Academy for Film (DAFF).

Don’t be shy to contact me. I’m always open to making something beautiful together.
